Html:
The Contact Details step is missing a validation summary. It appears that even after I added one, the CreateUserFinished routine is being hit without validation occuring.

Any ideas?
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.

I rewrote it to fix the validation and do the contact info in one step. I added fields to break out the address properly so you'll need to do some table changes first. I also added more validation. I had some other fields I needed in there - I think I stripped them all out. It will need a little additional formatting.

I put the code in the issue thread, for anyone interested.
I just went ahead and rewrote the member/register.aspx page so that everyone is happy: it has validation, only 1 form to fill out, and no wizard control!
